answers.answer: no sorry not familiar with those, I would imagine all they would give you is a positive or negative result for sugar but not the exact reading you need...I will include a site with info on kitty diabetes maybe that will answer your question. is your kitty on insulin or are you just wondering if he has diabetes???http://www.catinfo.org/?link=felinediabetes
I see dr. Redford replied to your question....http://www.medhelp.org/posts/Animal-Health---General/Diabetes-test-for-my-cat/show/1807608#post_question_start

question: I want to check my cat for glucose, there are home-tests available, but I don't know if urine test gives the same result as blood test.  Has anyone used Glucotest or PawCheck?  Both are home tests.  Appreciate any feedback.
title: Anyone used urine test for glucose?
